content: With the ranged support out of the way, you can safely engage the Bullguard. Since this one isn’t a mini-boss, he’ll go down a lot faster when you Immobilize and punish him during his lengthy swing attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Cave'.
The content is as follows:
With the ranged support out of the way, you can safely engage the Bullguard. Since this one isn’t a mini-boss, he’ll go down a lot faster when you Immobilize and punish him during his lengthy swing attacks.
